title: go hajdamaka go
content:
dear typophiles,

i'd like to show my last script on  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/hajdamaka/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015203856/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/hajdamaka/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/hajdamaka/")

it is a try to make an unicase anti-historic latin script with ukrainian flavour but without any kerning and ligatures. and make it without any references from you, latin people :)

welcome to ukraine ;)
author: andrijtype

comments.content:
Go Hajdamaka go!  
Go Ukraine go!  
Good for a "Visit Ukraine 2007" logo.

Aziz Mostafa,  
you was fantastically right ))

here it is:
